title: Leaver Buster
body: Due to client issues ( which havn't been address now for multiple years) I am sitting in low priority que. Are you able to remove me from this? I get to about the 3rd to 4th game and then as always you can't connect... How long does this need to go on? Furthermore, you're store doesn't work either, I've had the message ( you have exceeded the maximum number of transaction for the day, wait 24hours for like a weeks now.
